title: A Generalization Bound of Deep Neural Networks for Dependent Data. (arXiv:2310.05892v1 [stat.ML])
abstract: Existing generalization bounds for deep neural networks require data to be independent and identically distributed (iid). This assumption may not hold in real-life applications such as evolutionary biology, infectious disease epidemiology, and stock price prediction. This work establishes a generalization bound of feed-forward neural networks for non-stationary $\phi$-mixing data.
context:
Title: A Generalization Bound of Deep Neural Networks for Dependent Data. (arXiv:2310.05892v1 [stat.ML])
Abstract: Existing generalization bounds for deep neural networks require data to be independent and identically distributed (iid). This assumption may not hold in real-life applications such as evolutionary biology, infectious disease epidemiology, and stock price prediction. This work establishes a generalization bound of feed-forward neural networks for non-stationary $\phi$-mixing data.
translated_title: 深度神经网络对相关数据的泛化界限
translated_abstract: 现有的深度神经网络泛化界限要求数据是独立同分布的，而在现实应用中，如进化生物学、传染病流行病学和股价预测中，这个假设可能不成立。本研究建立了前馈神经网络在非平稳 $\phi$-混合数据上的泛化界限。
tldr: 该研究在非平稳相关数据上建立了前馈神经网络的泛化界限。
en_tdlr: This study establishes the generalization bound of feed-forward neural networks on non-stationary dependent data.
